Price recently bounced from $2 support and faced resistance at $2.30, testing market balance.  Breaking $2.30‚Äì$2.50 could trigger a Sign of Strength (SOS), with targets between $12‚Äì$15. Polkadot remains active in Web3 development, supporting a positive long-term outlook.  Investors should watch resistance levels for confirmation of the bullish pattern.  Bottom line: DOT‚Äôs current setup suggests technical optimism, but confirmation depends on sustained moves above resistance.
